amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the General Accounting Office, after consultation with the National Academy of Sciences, to conduct a study to assess the need (if any) for amendment of the prohibition on human cloning contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 1 and printed in House Report 108-21. Provides for a study by the General Accounting Office (GAO) to assess the need (if any) for amendment of the prohibition on human cloning. GAO must report its finding to Congress within 2 years.
